forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers this morning, becoming a steady rain during the afternoon hours. Thunder possible. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this evening with clearing overnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High around 65F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible early. Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible early. Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 60F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain developing later in the day. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening. A snow shower or two late - otherwise, mostly cloudy. Thunder possible. Low 1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...a snow shower possible later at night. Thunder possible. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning turning to light rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...remaining cloudy with snow showers late. Low 2C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Some snow showers mixing in later at night. Low 37F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High around 65F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 18C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 67F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
